items.title: 3-year-old dies in hot car while in custody of Alabama state contract worker: Police
items.description: Katerrius Sparks, 3, from Bessemer, Alabama, died on July 22, police and the county coroner said.

items.title: 14 people die from malnutrition in Gaza, health ministry says
items.description: The Hamas-run Ministry of Health in the Gaza Strip said in a Monday statement that another 14 people died of malnutrition over the previous 24 hours.

items.title: Russia hits Ukraine with hundreds of drones and missiles prompting NATO response
items.description: Polish and Swedish military aircraft were scrambled in response to a large Russian drone and missile attack launched across Ukraine on Sunday night.

items.title: WATCH:  Passengers exit plane via emergency slide after aborted takeoff
items.description: Passengers evacuated onto the runway via emergency slide after an American Airlines flight aborted its takeoff on the runway in Denver on Saturday.

items.title: WATCH:  Soccer coach who says he was deported over tattoo celebrates release from detention
items.description: A soccer coach who says he was mistakenly deported from the U.S. to El Salvador's CECOT mega-prison because of a tattoo celebrated his release from de...
